scripts.snippet: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW isil_mdc_view AS SELECT DISTINCT metadata_collections.id AS id, metadata_collections.jsonb AS jsonb, (isils.jsonb->>'tenant') AS tenant FROM metadata_collections metadata_collections JOIN isils isils ON (metadata_collections.jsonb->'permittedFor')::jsonb ? (isils.jsonb->>'isil');
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW metadata_sources_tiny AS SELECT id AS id, jsonb_build_object('id', jsonb->>'id', 'label', jsonb->>'label') AS jsonb FROM finc_mod_finc_config.metadata_sources;
